entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of wet flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of wet flurries late in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023
